rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the entrance for social gatherings and entertainment.
Functional minimalist kitchen with modern appliances.
Master bedroom with attached private balcony overlooking the swimming pool area and garden.
Additional bedroom designed for privacy and ample storage space.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy and auspicious beginnings.
Balcony window enhancing natural light, adheres to minimalist design and Vastu guidelines.
Door leading from the living area to an integrated swimming pool area with a small garden.

notes.vastu_compliance: The design incorporates north and east facing windows for natural light, and the layout is planned according to Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow.
notes.minimalist_design: Simplicity and functionality are at the core of this design. The use of clean lines, open spaces, and minimalistic finishes provide a serene environment.
notes.corner_plot_advantage: The corner plot allows for larger living areas and better integration with the swimming pool area.
